attributes.action: Pleated skirts at school makes us girls feel uncomfortable
attributes.additional_details: Make girls be aloud to bring back the skirts we used to wear. Not pleated skirts cause it makes us girls feel uncomfortable when they fly up or when we alre walking up some stairs and somebody looks up
attributes.background: Bring tight skirts back for school girls and let nails be aloud because, when pleated skirts fly up it’s embarrassing in front of everyone and makes us girls feel uncomfortable

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as its about something the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for. This would be the responsibility of your school. 

You might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234997
